original_text: ‘When I punished your people, they did not change how they lived. When I sent my prophets to you, you killed them as if you were a hungry lion.’ ‘When I punished your people, they did not change how they lived. When I sent my prophets to you, you killed them as if you were a hungry lion.’ ‘When I punished your people, they did not change how they lived. When I sent my prophets to you, you killed them as if you were a hungry lion.’ ‘When I punished your people, they did not change how they lived. When I sent my prophets to you, you killed them as if you were a hungry lion.’ ‘When I punished your people,
korean_text: 내가 너희 자녀들을 때린 것이 무익함은 그들이 징계를 받아들이지 아니함이라 너희 칼이 사나운 사자 같이 너희 선지자들을 삼켰느니라

sentences.original_text: they did not change how they lived.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 생활 방식을 바꾸지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: When I sent my prophets to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 나의 선지자들을 보냈을 때,

sentences.original_text: you killed them as if you were a hungry lion.
they did not change how they lived.
